What a great idea! Including non-fantasy football fans in the fun is a fantastic way to make the party more inclusive and enjoyable for everyone.

Sports-related trivia questions can be a great way to engage both fantasy football enthusiasts and casual sports fans. Here are some recommendations for trivia questions that are not too specific to fantasy football:

**General Sports Trivia:**

1. Which of the following athletes has won the most Olympic gold medals?
a) Michael Phelps
b) Usain Bolt
c) LeBron James
d) Tom Brady

2. Which team has won the most Super Bowl titles?
a) New England Patriots
b) Dallas Cowboys
c) Pittsburgh Steelers
d) Green Bay Packers

3. Who is the all-time leading scorer in the NBA?
a) Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
b) LeBron James
c) Michael Jordan
d) Steph Curry

**Football (Non-Fantasy) Trivia:**

1. What is the name of the famous football stadium in Green Bay, Wisconsin?
a) Lambeau Field
b) Soldier Field
c) AT&T Stadium
d) Heinz Field

2. Who is the winningest coach in NFL history?
a) Don Shula
b) Bill Belichick
c) Tom Landry
d) Vince Lombardi

3. What is the name of the college football championship game?
a) Rose Bowl
b) Cotton Bowl
c) Fiesta Bowl
d) College Football Playoff National Championship

**Other Sports Trivia:**

1. Which boxer won the most heavyweight championships?
a) Muhammad Ali
b) Mike Tyson
c) Floyd Mayweather
d) George Foreman

2. Who is the most successful tennis player in Grand Slam history?
a) Serena Williams
b) Roger Federer
c) Rafael Nadal
d) Novak Djokovic

3. Which team has won the most World Series titles?
a) New York Yankees
b) St. Louis Cardinals
c) San Francisco Giants
d) Boston Red Sox

Remember to keep the questions balanced in terms of difficulty and sports genre, so everyone has a chance to participate and have fun. You can also consider offering prizes for the winners or creating teams to make it a more collaborative effort.

By including a mix of sports trivia questions, you'll ensure that both fantasy football enthusiasts and casual sports fans have a blast at your party!
